properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 31 at 10:30PM PST until February 1 at 2:06PM PST by NWS Seattle WA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Washington...

Skokomish River At Potlatch affecting Mason County
Stillaguamish River At Arlington affecting Snohomish County
Skykomish River Near Gold Bar affecting Snohomish County
Tolt River Above Carnation affecting King County


The second round of heavy rain has moved into the Northern
Cascades tonight and will continue to move south through the area
Saturday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Skykomish River Near Gold Bar
* Until Saturday afternoon.
* At  9:30 PM Friday the stage was 15.9 feet.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Forecast...The river crested at 16.0 feet at 8 PM Friday and will
continue to fall to below flood stage early Saturday morning.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet, the Skykomish River will cause minor flooding
of low pasture lands and low lying roads...including Index-Galena
Rd and Tualco Loop Rd.  A stage of 15 feet on the Skykomish River
corresponds to a Phase 2 in the Snohomish County flood program.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars...vans...or trucks through flooded areas...this is
the cause of most flood related deaths in Washington. Be alert for
rapid changes and monitor developments by listening to NOAA Weather
radio or other local media.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Saturday afternoon
